page.title: 08GAMES
page.content: {Children at School play games at playtime :Danish Rounders,English Rounders,Softball Cricket,Catch,Tennis Football,Netball,Handstands. Some chant Riddles or Rhymes like this: "Crocodile,Crocodile, May we cross the water, To see your lovely daughter, Dressed in blue?" The person who is'it'has to call colours. Children wearing it get across.If they aren't they get chased and are 'it'.We conducted a survey to see which was the most popular game and this was Softball Cricket. Then we asked the seventh girl and boy on the register in each class at the Primary Schools questions about sports. The most popular sport was running. This was because those questioned are fast or they enjoyed it. Skittles is a popular game for adults .
